attributes.additional_details:
have a 4 day working week,allowing people to have a real rest from stress and strain,and thus allowing more quality time with family,to much time at work creates too much familiarity,and loathing of a job and employers.
maybe 1 hour extra of work time,each day could be added to the other 4 days,to make up for the extra day off on fridays.
wages for working  class people are terrible in this country,and dont allow families to go out together much,not when it costs about £100 +++ for a day out.
If families could spend more quality time together,happy,then this country wouldnt be so broken,and full of discontent
